subtitle: [Music]
Thinking Allowed.
Conversations on the leading edge of
knowledge and discovery with
psychologist Jeffrey Mishlove. Hello and
welcome. I’m Jeffrey Mishlove. Today we’ll
be exploring extraordinary human
experience. My guest is Rey Hernandez, who
is one of the founders of the Dr. Edgar
Mitchell Foundation for Research into
Extraterrestrial and Extraordinary
Experience. He is also a co-editor of
a large volume recently published called
Beyond UFOs: The Science of Consciousness
and Contact with Non-Human Intelligence.
Welcome, Rey. Thank you, Jeffrey.
Because of your work, you’ve had a big
impact in recent years. I think it’s
given a whole new boost to the study of
these amazing experiences. As I got
to know you earlier what I discovered is
that you’re really relatively new to
the field. It’s probably fair to say
that five, six years ago you had no
interest or involvement with anything of
a paranormal nature. And then that
changed rather suddenly for you. Correct.
Before March 4th, 2012,
I had zero interest and zero knowledge of
the paranormal, consciousness, non-human
intelligence, what we are now calling the
contact modalities, which we will be
defining later on in our discussion. So I
had zero background nor interest in
these topics. I also felt that everyone
that was interested in these topics were kooks.
So it’s a major, fundamental change. You
basically had a conventional
understanding of these things. At the
same time, you’re a well-educated person.
You work as a tax attorney. You’ve
studied city planning at my alma mater,
the University of California at Berkeley.
Correct. I was in a PhD program at UC
Berkeley, shortly after you left. I
arrived there in 1982. I left in ‘88, and I
was getting a doctorate in city and
regional planning. Then later on in
my life I became an attorney and I’ve
been working for more than 20 years as
an IRS tax attorney. So it’s the least
likely person that you would think would
be interested in these topics.
Uh-huh. And let me ask you a little bit
about your own family
and personal background. Well,
my wife and daughter had similar contact
with non-human intelligence and
initially with these objects which
the public calls UFOs, which I call and
our organization calls UAPs,
unidentified aerial phenomena. The
reason is because people are seeing
everything almost except actual
classical UFOs. And so our experience
actually started with my wife. We
both saw this energy being in our living
room, which cured our dog who was totally
paralyzed. And I could give you the
details of that if you like. Yes, let’s go into
some detail. So here you are,
conventional tax attorney. You live in
Miami. I believe you have a
Catholic background. When you say
an energy being appeared in your house, your
dog was very ill. As I remember the story,
you were about to have the dog
euthanized. That same day, correct. The day
before at about 8:00, we suddenly
noticed, myself and my friend, that our
dog was totally paralyzed, that she was
trying to move her head around, but
she couldn’t move her body. My wife
then came about an hour later. She had
gone to a three-day spiritual retreat at
our local Catholic church, where she was
basically meditating and praying for three
days’ straight. So she came fully charged
up. Would you say that your wife was more
open to these kinds of experiences? Now
she is, because she’s had a boatload
of these experiences, but before then, it
was strictly her contact with God and
spirit from a Catholic perspective. But
then she began praying all night for a
miracle. She was praying to la Virgen
de Guadalupe, the Virgin
from Guadalupe in Mexico. And in the morning,
we both checked our dog. Totally
paralyzed. That night before, I had called
our friend who was our veterinarian, and
he agreed to open up his practice to
euthanize our dog. So, the next day was
her last years of life. What happened
was that, when my wife went down the
stairs, she saw an object in the middle
of the living room. She began to pray and
then she called me down. After
minutes of me neglecting her, it was
Sunday morning at 6:00, I wanted my
beauty rest, she went upstairs, pulled me
out of bed, and said I had to see this.
We went downstairs and she disappeared
right in front of me. The dog disappeared
right in front of me. Your wife and your dog
disappeared in front of your eyes?
Correct, dematerialized. She was not there anymore.
And then I turned to the corner of our
living room, and what I saw was what I
now call an energy
being. Let me describe it for you.
It was approximately this wide, this height,
radiating energy like a mirage in the
desert that you see, that heat
exchange. Shimmering. Shimmering, correct.
It was shimmering multiple colors inside,
semitranslucent. And then this
intelligence got into my consciousness
and changed my thought pattern from a
logical, rational person. All of a sudden,
I didn’t care that my wife had disappeared
in front of me, the dog had been gone. I
then looked at that object, I squinted at
it. I waved my hand at it and said, “Ah, BS.
This is what you got me up for, for this
junk?” Then I turned around, walked
straight upstairs. I immediately was put to sleep.
Then 45 minutes later, when I woke up,
I was fully conscious. Then I ran
down the stairs, and poof, my wife was in
the middle of the living room saying in
Spanish, “Aleluya, aleluya, los angeles
la curado, los angeles la curado” - “the
angels cured her, the angels cured her.”
And the dog was running around the
living room completely cured. Not like
how she was before, because before her
paralysis, she was like an old lady with
ailments. She had arthritis. She
couldn’t run, she couldn’t jump. She was
taking tons of medications. And now she
was running around like a puppy. In
my head, the way it felt, it was like
an atom bomb exploded in your head, and
you’re trying to get some
semblance, you’re trying to ground yourself.
Then I would ask my wife, and then
she says, “Well, weren’t you there? You
saw it, it was an angel.” I said, “I didn’t
see an angel. I saw this energy being,” and
I described it to her. And so it was
massive confusion. She didn’t know she
had disappeared for 45 minutes. She had what I -
six months later discovered - the
terminology is missing time. To her,
she had gone down the stairs. I was right
behind her. She looked down. The dog
started running around, she started celebrating.
Uh-huh, as if no gap had occurred. No gap had
occurred. And then, I immediately went to the
internet. I thought it was paranormal related,
so researching paranormal this, paranormal
that. And then she did say, “Se parecia como
una nave pequena,” which means, “It appeared
to be like a little craft.” That she saw, that was the first original thing that
she saw before she went upstairs to get
me. Like a little UFO was inside our
living room. Okay. And I said, “But UFOs are
supposed to be outside, they’re not
inside.” So I said, maybe I’ll look at UFOs,
okay? So it was total bedlam, total
confusion, and Rey Hernandez, six hours a
day in my free time was on the internet.
And then two months later, my wife... the
dog woke her up at 3:30 in the morning.
She went outside. She looked up and there was
a big, gigantic… This one was a UFO. This was
a physical craft. Right above your house?
Right above our house,
a big gigantic, physical craft. And she
told me that morning, she said, “Oh, my
angels came and visited me last night.”
I said, “What do you mean angels?” So in my
head I’m thinking, an angelic being with
wings or something. And I said, “Well, what
was it? What did you see?” And then she
described it. I said, “This was a UFO.”
And she drew it out, and I
told her, I said, “Sweetheart, what you’re
drawing is a UFO.” She goes, “Oh, you
wouldn’t understand, you’re an atheist.” So
that’s when I finally understood that,
wow, this might be related to UFO
phenomena. Then she went to Mexico
for an entire month, and numerous times
she called down her angels. And what
appeared? These UFOs. The same thing.
So, after the initial experience there
were multiple other incidents that
occurred. Initially for my wife, for
the first six months. She even saw these
three human-looking beings that she
described as seven to eight feet tall that
were wearing white monks’ robes.
They didn’t walk, they floated in front
of her to a certain distance and then
they dematerialized. And prior to this
time, your wife was not prone to
visionary experiences. No nothing, absolutely
nothing. I mean, she doesn’t even watch TV,
she doesn’t go to the internet. We had
zero interest in these topics, both she
and I. And so to her it was like a
revelation. It was like an epiphany that
her angels are coming to communicate
with her. You developed an enormous
curiosity at that point. Well, during
these six months, I was on the internet. I
had ordered tons of UFO books, because
now I know this is UFO-related.
So I was beginning to read all
these materialist UFO books. And then
what had happened was, in August of 2012, I
had seen a video several days before of
this man doing what is commonly called CE5,
or HICE, human-initiated contact
experiences, where you’re out in the
desert or in the woods, and you’re calling down a UFO. But I was at the
front of my house waiting for a friend
who was going to get me his parking ticket,
so I can do a motion to consolidate. And
so he was late, and I was killing
time. I said, oh, what the hell, let’s
try to call down what my wife had seen.
Okay, so this is your first effort. My
first effort, and to me I wasn’t sincere.
But then once I got into it, I became
very sincere, and then it
came almost like a prayer, like a mantra,
wanting to give thanks to these modern
angels, that’s what I call them, that my
wife had been interacting with, because
our dog was like our first daughter. You
know, we loved her dearly, and she had a
miraculous healing. I wanted to give
them thanks. And then, lo and behold, after
15 minutes this huge object appeared
right on top of my next door neighbor’s
house, literally 30 feet away. I won’t give you all the details because it’ll
just take too much time to elaborate, but
basically it was telepathic
communication that took place. There were
thoughts that were put in my mind. One
thought was to go get my daughter, and I
got my daughter. And on the way,
they got me to leave, because we would
have been my daughter and I and three friends all night. My three friends left
after 10 minutes, but then the way
they got my daughter and me to
leave was that I thought I was being attacked by thousands of mosquitos.
I was slapping my legs, my arms. This was
August in Miami. But there were multiple
witnesses? Yes, yes. There were three adult
friends, my daughter who was 10 at that
time and myself. And so after my friends
had gone, about 20 minutes
before, I grabbed my daughter. I said, “Come
on, sweetheart, let’s get out of here. These mosquitoes are killing me. I can’t
take it anymore.” So we go inside and then we’re telling
my wife what had happened. And then my
daughter… I told her we had to go in because the mosquitos were killing me, my
daughter goes, “Daddy, there were no
mosquitoes outside.” And it was like The
Amazing Kreskin, you know who I’m
talking about? Yes. Mysteriously snapped his finger and then
I came out of my altered state of
consciousness. Now I was fully aware of
what took place, and I was like, “Oh my God,”
and I ran downstairs, grabbed my
camcorder, my professional camera. I ran
outside hoping to catch a picture or
video of this thing. Nothing was there,
okay? And then it was after that
experience that I had two years of
nonstop paranormal experiences, nonstop,
one after another, to the point where I
thought that I was losing my
mind. I could give you in
terms of how it started. I could skip
pretty much a year or so of experiences.
Well, did it seem to you that these
experiences had a purpose or
intentionality behind them?
Well, as you’re undergoing these
experiences, they don’t. But now I realize
it was a preparation, because they also
took me through a series of NDE-related
type of events. Similar to a
near-death experience? Similar to a near-death
experience, similar to the shamanic
journeys where you’re dying, you’re
being rebirthed again, and you’re dying,
being reborn again. That’s what
it seemed like. Would you say you’re a different person
now? Oh my goodness. It didn’t interfere with
your profession though? Yes, it did.
It did. Before I was a
total atheist material rationalist. Now I
know I’m an eternal spiritual being.
I know it. It’s not a belief. I know it,
because I was shown it, I experienced it.
And yes, it was very difficult to
undergo that transition from someone who
went to Berkeley for a PhD, you know,
total rationalist materialist into
someone who’s undergone this transition.
But yet, in a research study in our
book Beyond UFOs: The Science of
Consciousness and Contact with Non-Human
Intelligence, we administered roughly 60
questions that Dr. Kenneth Ring
administered in his book, The Omega
Project, where he compared approximately
85 individuals that had near-death
experiences with 85 individuals that had
UFO-related contact experiences. And
the 60 questions that we extracted were,
how do these individuals change from
these experiences? We duplicated his
findings 100%. It was 85% of these
individuals that underwent a dramatic
psychological profile change for the
positive: became more spiritual, less
religious, less egotistical, less
materialistic, more loving, more
consciously aware. They now had a mission,
okay, et cetera. Well, we’ve jumped ahead a bit,
because now you’re functioning in effect
as a researcher of paranormal phenomena,
and that’s not where you started. Correct, no,
no. What had happened was, let me tell your
audience members how I was having all these
different paranormal experiences from
August of 2012, which is approximately six
months after that initial experience, all
the way until May of 2013. In May of 2013,
what I’m going to tell your audience
members might be a little shocking, but
there are literally hundreds of individuals that have had very, very
similar experiences - which was the
experience of being taken to a matrix
reality. Okay, matrix reality.
A matrix, multidimensional reality. Approximately
half the people that took our survey, we asked that question. “Have you ever been
brought to a multidimensional
matrix reality which was non-3D, but it
seemed like it was just as real as a 3D
reality?” And 50% of the people said, “Yes.”
So this is my story. I was driving my car
in the middle of a traffic jam in Route
836, next to the airport in Miami -
those that live in South Florida know
the area that I’m talking about, tremendous traffic jam - listening to an
interview of this man doing a
documentary of art sculptures that he
had done from fat from a
liposuction. So I’m listening to this and
it's fascinating. This guy’s doing a
documentary on the fat from a
liposuction. And so, immediately I’m not
in the car anymore.
I’m just Mind, I’m just consciousness.
There was nothingness around me, okay.
All of a sudden, I’m inside this big,
gigantic, perceived to be like a wheel.
The wheel had perceived spokes. Inside
each of the different spokes was a video.
The video I intuitively knew what each
one was. It was separate videos, and it
turned out to be what I now call and our
organization calls, the contact
modalities, okay. In one segment was
near-death experiences. Another segment
was out-of-body experiences.
Another was UFO contact. Another one was
shamanic, hallucinogenic journeys.
Another one was remote viewing. Another
one was communication with ghosts and
spirits. Another one was... et cetera, et cetera.
All the different ways that humans are
piercing the veil and having contact
with non-human intelligence. It wasn’t a
voice. When I was looking at these videos,
it was like a knowingness, like, I knew
that, I know that, I know that, I know that.
And then, information, not a voice, came
into my consciousness that says, “These all
are just an example of all the different
ways that humans are communicating with
us.” Okay. “Humans are studying them as
separate and distinct phenomena.” To the
extent they get studied at all.
Correct, correct. But they said, “But in
essence, it’s one phenomenon,
because they’re all interrelated.” And
humans are calling this glue that’s
holding it all together consciousness,
but in fact, what it is,
is the very fabric of our reality. The
fabric of reality itself. The fabric of our reality.
Space and time. Space and time is the glue
that’s holding it all together,
okay. Now, as I was having this experience,
I had no idea what was going on. I
had zero understanding. Were you still
aware of the traffic? No, no, I was not in my
car. I was not in that reality. Completely
lost awareness of... I was in some other
non-3D reality in the middle of a perceived,
gigantic image where I was seeing all
these different phenomena, and then as I
was receiving this information, it
was just information coming down, but
there was nothing else around me.
Did it feel like you were wide
awake and fully conscious? Oh,
I was fully conscious. It was like
you and I right here. Fully conscious. As
real as our 3D reality. And this other
reality, it seemed physical to you, or tangible
maybe? It was tangible, that’s a better term,
because it certainly was not physical. It
was more like an ethereal consciousness
reality. And so then it gave me
instructions. Again, it wasn’t a voice, it
was just straight information. Some
people talk about a download. Well,
that’s a human term, like a
download, but to me it was just straight
information. It was like a straight knowingness. The knowingness was
that, “You need to inform humanity of the
relationship between us,” I
still had no idea what “us” was,
okay? “You have to inform humanity of the
relationship between us, the spirit world
and consciousness.” There’s two criteria
here. You’re going to need help, but this is
not about you getting rich and the
people that you get to help you have to
have minimal ego. I was back in my car,
driving in the middle of a traffic jam. I was,
“What the hell just took place?”
I immediately, in the middle of that traffic jam
called after I settled down a
little bit, maybe five minutes later,
ten minutes later, whatever that was, I called another experiencer, the only
person I was able to talk about these
things to. Because for my wife, it was
all religiously oriented, you know? And so
this other experiencer had had a lot of
this paranormal experience and was very
familiar with this, so I called her and I
told her what was going on. The
interesting part was not that experience.
It’s what immediately developed. Was there
missing time or anything? Well, okay, good
point. When I got back into the car driving,
guess what was playing on the radio? Well,
I wouldn’t know. The same interview with
that man doing a documentary
about liposuction. It didn’t
skip a beat. There was no time
that had been spent. And how much time did it
seem like to you? At least 20 or 30
minutes, but yet when I got back to
that interview, it was
nothing, no time had gone. Okay, so now you
were in effect given a mission. Well, now I know
that, but back then, I was like, “What in
the world just happened?” I didn’t know
whether I had died, I had a heart attack,
I went to heaven and I came back. I
didn’t know what had happened. Did it feel like
heaven? No, it just felt like
that particular experience and that’s it.
Then when I got home that afternoon - I
was going to work to the IRS
federal building in downtown Miami - I
got home late that afternoon,
I don’t know, 6:00 or so. It was still
daylight time. And I got an email from
Mary Rodwell. Now, let me take you back
six months previous to that, October of
2012. In October of 2012 I had sent like
8-10 emails out to these very
famous names in ufology,
wanting someone to talk to, because
I had no one to talk to. So I sent that out
to all of these people. This woman
that I’d been communicating with,
I’d sent it to one of these individuals,
and he gave that email to this lady and
she reached out to me. But the only people I think that reached back
to me were Whitley Strieber, and this
man, Grant Cameron. And it was someone
else that had given that email to Grant
Cameron. They both had
one-paragraph responses, that
sort of thing. It was like a
message for help. So that was in October
of 2012. When I got home that
evening I got an email from Mary Rodwell.
Mary Rodwell, for the folks that
don’t know her, she’s one of the world’s
major researchers of individuals that
have seen UFOs and have had contact with
non-human intelligence, i.e., known as
experiencers. Dr. John Mack used that
term. And so I got an email from her. She was one of those ten people that I
had sent, and she said, “Dear Rey, I’m sorry
I’m communicating to you at
this time, but the email that you had
sent me in October, I just received
right it now.” Just like that. And so I then
sent an email back. I said, “Well, thank you
for responding, Mary, but over the last
six months, these are all the crazy experiences
that happened.” I had a current diary. I
sent her my diary of all of my
experiences. And I said, “And today, I had
this experience.” So then she said, “Oh my
God, Rey, let’s talk on Skype.” I didn’t
know what Skype was. She was the one that
showed me how to use that. And now, she’s Australian.
From Australia, correct, like, 12-hour time
difference. And so we wound up talking on
Skype until 1:30 in the morning.
And I said, “Well, Mary, it’s 1:30. I have
to go to work tomorrow morning.” “No, no,
we need to continue to talk,”
because she saw my profound
experiences. The very next morning, at
9:30 in the morning - I work at home,
I have all my cases at home, I go to the
office once in a while - and so 9:30 in
the morning, I get a message. “Hello.” “Who’s
this?” “Dr. Rudy Schild.” “Who?” Dr. Rudy
Schild, emeritus professor of
astrophysics at Harvard University, a
very dear friend of the late Dr. John Mack,
who was a professor of psychiatry at
Harvard Medical School, who Rudy had
introduced to Dr. John Mack about the
topic of consciousness, about the
multiverse. Why? Because Dr. John Mack
approached Rudy and said, “Rudy, I have some of
my clients, many of my clients that
were dealing with the UFO phenomena
that were being brought to other
realities,” what I call matrix
realities. And, “Is there such a thing as a
multiverse? Is there such a thing as
other dimensions?” And this leads back
to the topic of consciousness that
Dr. Mack was fully aware of, but how does
the multiverse deal with
consciousness and all that, so that’s
how Rudy became close friends with Dr.
John Mack. So what happened, I found out
later on, not that day, but Mary had
sent Rudy an email about my experiences.
And part of that experience, which I
didn’t go into detail, dealt with physics
that were given to me. So when
individuals get physics “downloads,” Mary
sends it to Rudy. But she always requests
the permission of that person. She did
send me an email, but I didn’t get to
read that email yet, so I didn’t get to
say, “It’s okay for Rudy to
give me a call.” So Rudy jumped the gun. He
reached out to you. He reached out to me at 9:30 in the morning
the very next day. So he introduced
himself, and he had me explain to
him what had happened. And he says, “Rey, what
happened to you was that you visually
experienced Dr. Edgar Mitchell’s quantum
hologram theory of consciousness.” And
he also believed that all of these, what
I now call the contact
modalities, Rudy was calling modern
miracles. He had just written a paper
titled “The Modern Miracles.” I didn’t know
that. He says, “What I call the
modern miracles, and Edgar agreed to it,
that all of these different experiences
are actually one phenomenon. That
consciousness is the key to
understanding it.” My vision,
that experience was the same
experience that Rudy told me
Edgar had written up and Edgar had hypothesized
about. Then he went on to
explain what that theory was. At that
point, I really didn’t understand it,
because as you know, it’s based upon physics.
Rudy had been working with Edgar, but
Edgar had been working with numerous PhD
physicists all around the world. Now
we’re talking about the astronaut, Edgar
Mitchell, who is also the founder of the
Institute of Noetic Sciences. Correct.
My goodness, a brilliant genius,
a brilliant man. And then I later found
out the Institute of Noetic
Sciences was pretty much the
most important institute that’s studying
the psi phenomena and consciousness.
And Dean Radin, who is now one of
our advisors to the FREE organization, is
the lead scientist at IONS. Anyway,
Rudy then begins to explain this very
complex theory, which is physics-based
about resonance, coherence, how the human
mind interacts with information fields
that Hal Puthoff had put together with
Bernard Haisch, another very well-known
physicist. And so, he was explaining the
physics behind that. I was
trying to understand it and
grasp it, so at the end of 90
minutes we were ending our
discussion, Rudy said, “Rey, write down this telephone number,” so I wrote it
down. He said, “This is the telephone
number of my mentor.”
So I’m saying to myself, “Who in the hell
could be this guy’s mentor?” He’s a
professor of astrophysics at Harvard, you
know, and one of the world’s leading experts
on black holes. Well, everyone needs a mentor. Needs a mentor.
And so I said, “Well, who’s your mentor, Rudy?” “Dr.
Edgar Mitchell. He only lives 90 minutes
away from you in Lake Worth, Florida. It’s
important for you to reach out to him.”
I finally worked up the courage to give
Edgar a call, and it was like four hours
later because I was scared of giving him
a call. I finally called him and he
says, “I’ve been waiting for your phone call.”
So I immediately thought, “Is this ESP-related?
Is that why he said that?”
But no. What had happened was that Rudy
had called him in the time being. And he says,
“Edgar, you won’t believe it. Here’s a man
who was taken to a multidimensional
reality, was given this image of all of
the contact modalities,” what Rudy was
calling the modern miracles, how they’re
all interrelated, “and he was describing your
quantum hologram.” So Edgar became
fascinated, and he goes to me, “Rey,
what are you doing tomorrow at 10:00?”
I said, “Well, I don’t have any plans. I could
take the day off tomorrow.” He says, “Can you
come by my house? I only live 90
minutes away.” He gave me his address. Again, mind you, this is two days after
that experience. Uh-huh. Everything just came
together by itself
practically. Correct. In fact, more
than that, as if it were orchestrated
from another level, because of the delay
of your email until that point. Correct.
I now know, and that wasn’t the only
experience that has happened to me, that
these experiences that were happening to
me were orchestrated experiences,
obviously guided by some higher-level,
non-human intelligence that we just
don’t fully understand. And so I spent
six hours at Edgar’s home. He basically
took me through his whole life, from him
being a baby, how his parents owned two
stores in Roswell, the north end and the
south end, the baby
clothes that he had, a picture of him on
a pony when he was young. I mean, to
him graduating from Roswell, about
the Roswell crash right before he went
off to Carnegie
Mellon. How he then went into the Navy,
became a test pilot, was part
of Chuck Yeager’s test pilot group. How they
took all the pilots from that group to
NASA. He knew many of the early
astronauts from that program. And how NASA
had brought him to MIT. How he supervised
the construction of the Apollo module, so
when the Apollo XIII had their problems,
Edgar told me it was three people in
that movie with Tom Hanks.
Everything. I mean, Edgar told me everything, okay.
Then after that, he says, “Well, Rey,
I want to learn more about your
experiences.” And so in my head I was like,
“I don’t even know this man.” He spent all
